item.title: Who Is Cuban Doll? Rapper Denies Knowing Offset - Newsweek
item.description:
Who Is Cuban Doll? Rapper Denies Knowing Offset  Newsweek

Rapper Cuban Doll responded to allegations of engaging in an affair with Offset, who is married to Cardi B. In an Instagram video, Cardi announced her and Offset’s split on Tuesday night. Although the “Money” rapper said no one was to blame for their decision to part ways, Offset’s alleged infidelity was revealed after text messages of the Migos rapper attempting to orchestrate a threesome were released by TMZ on Wednesday. Offset reportedly requested a woman named Summer Bunni to help him set up a ménage à trois with Doll. The "Bankrupt" rapper denied the threesome and said she never met u...

item.title: There May Be A Twist To That Sudden Cardi B & Offset Breakup - Refinery29
item.description:
There May Be A Twist To That Sudden Cardi B & Offset Breakup  Refinery29

Yesterday, Cardi B casually and calmly announced that she and husband Offset had split. "Things just haven't been working out between us for a long time," she said in an Instagram video. "It's nobody's fault. I guess, like, we grew out of love. But we're not together anymore." They appeared to remain on good terms, with Cardi stressing that they were "really good friends" and "really good business partners," but an Instagram post from a model has people wondering if there's more to this split that meets the eye. After a post on The Shade Room appeared to document Offset on FaceTime with ano...

item.title: Cardi B Shares Baby's Picture Hours After Offset Split - International Business Times
item.description:
Cardi B Shares Baby's Picture Hours After Offset Split  International Business Times

Cardi B has finally shared the first picture of her daughter after shielding her baby from the paparazzi for months. Millions of fans have already reacted to Cardi B's baby's cute picture online. The post is also significant because it came just a few hours after the rapper announced that she is splitting from Offset. “My heart,” Cardi B wrote on the Instagram post of her daughter’s picture. In the photo, the baby is surrounded by pink. Her headband, bow and dress are all in pink. Her clothing has the name of the baby, Kulture. The post has over 8.5 million likes as of this writing, and fan...

item.title: Cardi B Faces Down Pissed-Off Judge in Strip-Club Brawl Case - The Daily Beast
item.description:
Cardi B Faces Down Pissed-Off Judge in Strip-Club Brawl Case  The Daily Beast

Raymond Hall/Getty Cardi B arrived at Queens Criminal Court on Friday with what could best be described as an air of dour glamour. The “Bodak Yellow” rapper, whose given name is Belcalis Almanzar, sported long rainbow hair (a la Tekshi 6ix9ine’s dye job), a black fur-collared jacket, and Louboutin booties. She had crystal-encrusted nails that sparkled with each minuscule hand movement. She donned a wide-brimmed, Fedora-esque hat upon entering court, as well as large sunglasses, almost reminiscent of the old Hollywood vibe of her Marilyn Monroe getup when she surrendered to cops in October f...

item.title: Judge: Cardi B must not contact strip club melee victims - The Associated Press
item.description:
Judge: Cardi B must not contact strip club melee victims  The Associated Press

NEW YORK (AP) — Cardi B must not contact, in person or through social media, the victims of a melee she was involved in at a New York strip club, a judge ordered Friday. The platinum rapper appeared in court in New York City after a summons was issued Oct. 1 for misdemeanor reckless endangerment and assault. Her lawyer has said she didn't harm anybody. Police said Cardi B and her entourage were at the club around 3 a.m. when she argued with a 23-year-old bartender. They say a fight broke out during which chairs, bottles and hookah pipes were thrown, slightly injuring the woman and another e...

item.title: Cardi B's chaotic week: Rapper makes court appearance amid breakup and major Grammy nominations - The Independent
item.description:
Cardi B's chaotic week: Rapper makes court appearance amid breakup and major Grammy nominations  The Independent

Donning Louboutin heels, a black fur coat and a bold new hairstyle, Cardi B arrived at the Queens Criminal Court in New York City to face assault and reckless endangerment charges over a strip club brawl she was allegedly involved in earlier this year. The rapper, whose real name is Belcalis Marlenis Almánzar, smiled to a herd of paparazzi as she entered the court and left shortly after, at one point jokingly asking, "Am I famous?" She was released without bail during a brief hearing. Cardi B initially missed an appearance scheduled five days earlier, receiving a stern warning from the judg...

item.title: Cardi B Released Without Bail In Rescheduled Court Appearance - Refinery29
item.description:
Cardi B Released Without Bail In Rescheduled Court Appearance  Refinery29

Cardi B made an appearance in court Friday morning after missing her scheduled date earlier this week. The judge warned that a warrant for her arrest would be issued if she didn't show, but the rapper, who recently announced her split from Offset, dodged photographers bright and early to attend her Queens hearing. According to TMZ, she was released without bail but was told not to have any contact with the victims — and that includes social media posts. item.title: Cardi B and Offset Relationship Timeline Before Split - Newsweek
item.description:
Cardi B and Offset Relationship Timeline Before Split  Newsweek

After one year of marriage, Cardi B and Offset called it quits. The “Money” rapper took to Instagram to announce their split on Tuesday night. “So everybody been bugging me and everything and you know I’ve been trying to work things out with my baby father for a hot minute now,” Cardi said. “We are really good friends and we are really good business partners—you know he’s always somebody that I run to talk to, and we got a lot of love for each other but things just haven’t been working out between us for a long time.” Cardi—whose real name is Belcalis Almánzar—married Offset—whose real name...

item.title: Cardi B Posts First Photo Of Baby Kulture & The Internet Kan't Deal - Refinery29
item.description:
Cardi B Posts First Photo Of Baby Kulture & The Internet Kan't Deal  Refinery29

Since giving birth to her first child with husband Offset in July — named Kulture Kiari Cephus — Cardi B has taken a page out of Beyoncé’s book and kept the newborn completely out of the spotlight. There have been no pictures, no videos, no nothing. All that changed Wednesday when the “Money” rapper shared the first-ever photo of her 4-month-old baby girl. And honestly, the internet kan’t handle how kute she is. Baby Kulture came through dripping in a car seat for all 36 million of Cardi’s followers; rocking a customized bib wit her name on it, a pink headband, and a look of adoration for w...

item.title: Reason Behind Cardi B, Offset Breakup Revealed - International Business Times
item.description:
Reason Behind Cardi B, Offset Breakup Revealed  International Business Times

Cardi B and Offset’s split was fueled by numerous speculations, including the latter’s alleged infidelity that involved female rapper Cuban Doll and another woman named Summer Bunni. On Wednesday, TMZ published an image of what appears to be leaked text messages between Offset and Bunni. The conversation the they had alluded to a scheduled three-way that the male rapper planned. Based on the leaked image, the conversation happened on June 28. It’s interesting to note that Cardi B gave birth to daughter Kulture Kiari Cephus on July 10, just a couple of weeks after the text messages about the...

item.title: Cardi B's Post-Breakup Glow-Up Is Coming & I Can't Wait - Refinery29
item.description:
Cardi B's Post-Breakup Glow-Up Is Coming & I Can't Wait  Refinery29

When I first heard the rumors that Cardi B and Offset were dating last year, I said a prayer to the trap gods and goddesses to bless their union. I couldn’t think of two people in the hip-hop space more suited for each other, and that meant something. For Black girls who grew up reading urban fiction novels like The Coldest Winter Ever, a hip-hop power couple is just as endearing to us as A Christmas Prince is to white millennial women. A Black love story set against a backdrop of Billboard hits, foreign cars, and expensive jewelry is a fantasy snatched straight from my 16-year-old mind. Wa...

item.title: Cardi B Announces Split From Offset - International Business Times
item.description:
Cardi B Announces Split From Offset  International Business Times

Cardi B took to social media to announce her split from husband Offset on Tuesday. The "Drip" singer, whose real name is Belcalis Marlenis Almánzar, posted a video saying the two “are not together anymore.” In the video, she said they are really good friends, business partners and have a lot of love for each other, however, things haven’t been working out between them. She added the split was nobody’s fault and that they grew out of love. "It might take time to get a divorce and I'm always going to have a lot of love for him,” she concluded. A lot of fans expressed their disappointment post...

[Page Six] …..Meanwhile, this Cardi-Offset divorce business is getting messy. TMZ reports leaked texts allegedly sent by Offset to Summer Bunni suggest he was trying to arrange a threeway with her and rapper Cuban Doll. The texts appear to have been sent on June 28, a couple weeks before Cardi B gave birth to their daughter Kulture. TMZ reports screenshots of the texts leaked a few hours before Cardi B announced on Tuesday night t...

item.title: Let's give Cardi B a minute - CNN
item.description:
Let's give Cardi B a minute  CNN

Before you tweet me asking, "Why is Cardi B's marital split news?" I will beat you to the punch and say it's not, really. Cardi shot to the top of Twitter trends Wednesday after she announced her split from husband and fellow rapper Offset on Instagram. Celebrity couples who eventual break up is almost a given these days, unless they are in the rarefied air of a few. (You have the power to destroy us Tom Hanks and Rita Wilson, so please keep hanging in there.) Cardi has earned her right to grieve the end of her year-long marriage in private, should she so choose. But given Offset's success ...

item.description:
Watch: Cardi B Announces Split from Offset  Newsweek

Rapper Cardi B announced that she and husband Offset of the Migos are no longer "together" in an Instagram posted early Wednesday morning. Cardi B, whose real name is Belcalis Almánzar and Offset, born Kiari Cephus, have had an on-and-off relationship since 2017 and were secretly married in September 2017, which was revealed publicly when TMZ obtained a photo of their marriage license in June 2018. item.title: Cardi B’s private jet forced to make emergency landing - NME Live
item.description:
Cardi B’s private jet forced to make emergency landing  NME Live

The rapper was flying from LA to New York when it was forced to make an unexpected stop Cardi B Cardi B‘s private jet was forced to make an emergency landing earlier today (November 26) en route from Los Angeles to New York. The plane was reportedly grounded in Chicago after one of its passengers required medical attention. TMZ reports the person who became ill was not a member of the rapper’s crew. item.title: Emerging From Migos as His Own Man: The Metamorphosis of Offset - The New York Times
item.description:
Emerging From Migos as His Own Man: The Metamorphosis of Offset  The New York Times

Correction: November 29, 2018 An earlier version of this story misstated the relationship between Offset’s mother, Latabia, and his father-figure, Kevin. Kevin is her ex-husband, not her husband. ATLANTA — When the rapper Offset, bleeding from the mouth and hands, staggered through the bedroom door of his suburban home around 5 one morning in May, his wife, Cardi B, went ballistic. She was about seven months pregnant with the couple’s first child, and woke up early to have her makeup done before another busy day. Not much of a sleeper, Offset had run to the store in his lime-green Dodge Cha...

item.title: Migos Just Made Carpool Karaoke Cool Again - Refinery29
item.description:
Migos Just Made Carpool Karaoke Cool Again  Refinery29

Migos came to this week’s "Carpool Karaoke " prepared — with thousands of dollars in cash. The hip hop trio takes time to count their money between songs, in what promises to be one of the funniest "Carpool Karaoke" episodes yet. The group, which is made up of rappers Takeoff, Quavo, and Offset, even stops to go shopping with host James Corden. In the promotional clip, the trio performs some of their own hits, including this year’s “Walk It Talk It.” They also sing (and dab) along to Whitney Houston’s “I Wanna Dance with Somebody.” Quavo and Takeoff both released solo albums this fall, but ...

item.title: Madison Beer stars in Music Box episode 38 as she releases 'Hurts Like Hell' video - The Independent
item.description:
Madison Beer stars in Music Box episode 38 as she releases 'Hurts Like Hell' video  The Independent

It's hard to believe we're almost at the end of Music Box series four, already! We have three sessions left to go, including this week's episode with the lovely Madison Beer. The US singer shot to fame after receiving praise from fellow pop artist Justin Bieber. Now she's carving out her own career in music, with heartfelt, cool pop that has clearly struck a chord with fans. Madison dropped into the Music Box studio as she was visiting the UK, and gave us two lovely, intimate renditions of her songs "Dead" and "Home With You". We're also excited to share her video for new single "Hurts Like...

item.title: Metro Boomin, Migos' Takeoff And Legendary Rockers Queen Take Over The Top 10 This Week - Forbes
item.description:
Metro Boomin, Migos' Takeoff And Legendary Rockers Queen Take Over The Top 10 This Week  Forbes

LONDON, ENGLAND – JULY 07: Takeoff of Migos perform on the Main Stage during Wireless Festival 2018 at Finsbury Park on July 7, 2018, in London, England. (Photo by Tabatha Fireman/Getty Images) After producing hit singles for some of the biggest names in hip-hop, such as Drake, Future, Migos and Post Malone, this week, Metro Boomin is enjoying his well-deserved moment in the spotlight. The most sought-after producer in the business debuts his solo album Not All Heroes Wear Capes at No. 1 on the Billboard 200 with just under 100,000 equivalent units, giving him his first leader and his third...

item.title: Watch Migos deliver an unlikely Neil Diamond cover on ‘Carpool Karaoke’ - NME Live
item.description:
Watch Migos deliver an unlikely Neil Diamond cover on ‘Carpool Karaoke’  NME Live

They're also carrying a cool $250,000 in cash... Migos and James Corden Migos are the latest stars to receive the Carpool Karaoke treatment with James Corden. The Late Late Show host took a ride with Offset, Takeoff and Quavo – with the clip showing the trap trio as they rap their own tracks and deliver a cover of Whitney Houston’s ‘I Wanna Dance with Somebody (Who Loves Me)’. But the most unexpected moment comes as the group deliver a cover of Neil Diamond’s ’Sweet Caroline’ that sees them providing their own distinctive ad-libs on the track. After performing the tracks, it’s revealed that...

item.title: Nicki Minaj, Cardi B, and the sexist female rapper paradigm behind their feud, explained - Vox.com
item.description:
Nicki Minaj, Cardi B, and the sexist female rapper paradigm behind their feud, explained  Vox.com

Nicki Minaj Photo by Jacopo Raule/Getty Images The two artists’ latest clash reveals just as much about the fans who pay attention to feuds as it does about the rappers who get into them. Nicki Minaj and Cardi B’s feud has everything: a physical altercation in couture gowns; the alleged leaking of private phone numbers on the internet; a 10-part Instagram saga; an odd call for a truce. The only thing missing from this clash of rap titans is an actual rap song, but that’s hardly necessary in our current era of social media-driven feuds. The latest chapter in the now year-old squabble began o...

item.title: Long A Team Player, Migos' Takeoff Lands His First Solo Hot 100 Hit - Forbes
item.description:
Long A Team Player, Migos' Takeoff Lands His First Solo Hot 100 Hit  Forbes

(Photo by Prince Williams/ Getty Images) As part of the trap trio Migos with Offset and Quavo, Takeoff boasts more than two dozen Billboard charting songs. This week, however, the Atlanta rapper reaches a new career milestone with “Last Memory,” his first solo single to chart on the Hot 100. Produced by MonstaBeatz, the track debuts there at No. 54. It also claims No. 18 on On-Demand Streaming Songs, No. 23 on Hot Rap Songs and No. 25 on Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Songs. The lead single off Takeoff’s just-released album debut The Last Rocket, “Last Memory” marks his second solo appearance on the Hot 1...

item.title: Takeoff – ‘The Last Rocket’ review - NME Live
item.description:
Takeoff – ‘The Last Rocket’ review  NME Live

The Migos underdog proves his worth on this eclectic, engaging – and often emotionally bare – collection Takeoff Depending on who you ask, Takeoff is either the most underrated or least distinctive member of Migos. After all, the 24-year-old has been notably absent from two of the Atlanta trio’s biggest musical moments to date: their 2016 megahit ‘Bad and Boujee’ (although Takeoff will always dispute the notion that he missed out on that one; see his heavily-memed quote “do it look like I’m left off ‘Bad and Boujee’?”) and Calvin Harris’ ‘Slide’, the chart-slaying collaboration with Frank O...

item.title: Halsey And Wes Scheck Land Top 10 Hits Behind Maroon 5 And Cardi B's Massive No. 1 - Forbes
item.description:
Halsey And Wes Scheck Land Top 10 Hits Behind Maroon 5 And Cardi B's Massive No. 1  Forbes

US singer Halsey performs during the MTV Europe Music Awards at the Bizkaia Arena in the northern Spanish city of Bilbao on November 4, 2018. (Photo by LLUIS GENE / AFP) (Photo credit should read LLUIS GENE/AFP/Getty Images) Despite the fact that it waited in second place for weeks before it finally rose to No. 1 on the Hot 100, Maroon 5 and Cardi B’s “Girls Like You” has now ruled the all-genre singles listing for seven consecutive turns, a lengthier-than-expected stay for a tune that has already enjoyed so many frames so close to the peak. Behind the popular pairing, two newly-released si...

item.title: What are Nicki Minaj and Cardi B Fighting About? - Newsweek
item.description:
What are Nicki Minaj and Cardi B Fighting About?  Newsweek

Nicki Minaj and Cardi B's beef took center stage Monday after the rap stars spilled a boatload of tea on each other. For those not attuned to the ongoings between the two, here's a breakdown of what went down before the duo called an unexpected truce. The tension between Cardi and Minaj appeared to first surfaced in March 2017 when the "Barbie Tingz" hitmaker reportedly liked a post that mocked the rising talent's rapping style, according to Glamour. Minaj then seemingly slammed Cardi on Katy Perry's "Swish Swish" upon rapping, "Silly rap beefs just get me more checks/ My life is a movie, I...

item.title: Cardi B and Nicki Minaj Are Having a Night - Jezebel
item.description:
Cardi B and Nicki Minaj Are Having a Night  Jezebel

Image: via Getty Nicki Minaj and Cardi B’s beef is so good I’m starting to suspect it’s marketing for a new collab or something. On Monday night, Variety reported that Minaj addressed her ageless feud with Cardi on her Beats 1 Queen Radio show, claiming, among other things, that Cardi tried to sabotage her career by blocking Offset and 21 Savage from working with her; that she didn’t leak Cardi’s phone number; and, most importantly, that it was her friend Rah Ali who “really, really beat Cardi’s ass bad” at a Harper’s Bazaar fashion week party last month, not security. “You went home and to...

item.title: How Long Has This Nicki Minaj & Cardi B Feud Been Going On? Here’s A Timeline - Refinery29
item.description:
How Long Has This Nicki Minaj & Cardi B Feud Been Going On? Here’s A Timeline  Refinery29

Photo: Gary Gershoff/Getty Images. The Cardi B and Nicki Minaj drama reached a fever pitch when the nearly year-long feud culminated in a public fight last week in New York City. Following the fight, the women continued throwing stones at one other, with Cardi (née Belcalis Almanzar), 25, and Minaj (née Onika Maraj), 35, taking swipes on Instagram and the radio, respectively. But how did this even start? When did their conflict begin? I wrote a poem to sum up the 1,000 words ahead: "Cardi B came on the scene, said 'Nicki hold my beer.' Nicki glared, and fumed, and yelled, 'Bitch, I'm still ...
